LanguageData.EatFirstDifferentFood.stages.0.label: Eating different foods
LanguageData.EatFirstDifferentFood.stages.0.descripti: New food, new experience. I don't need to worry about getting tired of food!
LanguageData.EatSecondDifferentFood.stages.0.label: Abundant food
LanguageData.EatSecondDifferentFood.stages.0.descript: I have tasted so much rich food, how wonderful my life is!
